name: PixelNerds
description:
PixelNerds is about getting 4 specific nerds in the right order. The nerds and the order are randomly chosen each time, and duplicate faces are allowed.

Tap a head and keep tapping to switch nerds.

When 4 heads are selected, press SUBMIT
Below each face a colored square will appear:

* Green - Correct head, correct place
* Yellow - Head is part of the right lineup, but is misplaced
* Red - Head doesn't exist in this lineup

If you get a score below 7, you'll be awarded a star; or rather the face of a star! :)

Enjoy!
